body_html:
Just to add something to this classic issue:

  • I'd like a functional wrapper, too.
  • Of course it should work with packed sequences (not hard to do either).
  • Finally the bikeshedding: Maybe "elementwise" is a more accurate description than time distributed? After all, this throws all timesteps in one giant batch rather than each timestep separately.

I've implemented this a few times now for things like embeddings and more obscure transformations, so I'd love to see this in torch.nn.rnn.utils and as a Module...

If we want this, I'd be very happy to submit a PR.
